title: Any type of interval
description: Type that matches any type of interval which can be one of: a number which may be a value in cents or the number of divisions for EDO, a string as a just intonation ratio in format "<integer>/<integer>", or array with two items where the first one is the approximate number of 12-EDO semitones and the second one is the deviation from that in divisions.

oneOf.title: Interval value in cents or divisions
oneOf.description: A number which may be a value in cents or the number of divisions for EDO. If the value is in division it should be an integer.
